abstract: In 2013, income tax and taxes on gifts and estates will revert to higher rates if Congress makes no changes to laws before elections; under current law, each individual may give away up to $5.12 million free of gift taxes, although a gift tax return must be filed for amounts over $13,000; the $5.12 million uses up what is known in tax law as the unified credit for gift and estate taxes, and many financial advisers are encouraging clients to take advantage of the credit now.
lead_paragraph: In 2013, income tax and taxes on gifts and estates will revert to higher rates if Congress makes no changes to laws before elections.
